option.name: originalContent
option.value:
program dqags_nag_test implicit none
c Test program for DQAGS (Netlib/QUADPACK) and D01AHF (NAG) c Compatible with Microsoft Fortran PowerStation 4.0
c External function to be integrated external func_for_int
c DQAGS variables double precision a, b, epsabs, epsrel, result, abserr integer limit, neval, ier, last integer lenw parameter (lenw = 400) integer iwork(lenw) double precision work(lenw)
c NAG D01AHF variables double precision nag_a, nag_b, nag_epsabs, nag_epsrel double precision nag_result, nag_abserr integer nag_limit integer nag_leniw, nag_lenw parameter (nag_leniw = 200) parameter (nag_lenw = 200) integer nag_iw(nag_leniw) double precision nag_w(nag_lenw) integer nag_ifail
c Common variables double precision analytical_sol
write(*,*) '==========================================' write(*,*) 'DQAGS (Netlib) and D01AHF (NAG) Test' write(*,*) '==========================================' write(*,*) write(*,*) 'Integrating f(x) = x*x from 0 to 1' write(*,*) 'Analytical solution = 1/3' analytical_sol = 1.0d0 / 3.0d0 write(*,*) 'Analytical solution:', analytical_sol write(*,*)
c --------------------------------- c Test 1: DQAGS from Netlib/QUADPACK c --------------------------------- write(*,*) '--- Testing DQAGS (Netlib/QUADPACK) ---' a = 0.0d0 b = 1.0d0 epsabs = 1.0d-10 epsrel = 1.0d-10 limit = 100
call DQAGS(func_for_int, a, b, epsabs, epsrel, result, + abserr, neval, ier, limit, lenw, last, iwork, work)
write(*,*) 'DQAGS Results:' write(*,*) ' Result:', result write(*,*) ' Absolute error estimate:', abserr write(*,*) ' Number of evaluations:', neval write(*,*) ' Exit code (ier):', ier write(*,*) ' Actual absolute error:', abs(result - analytical_sol) write(*,*)
c --------------------------------- c Test 2: D01AHF from NAG Library c --------------------------------- write(*,*) '--- Testing D01AHF (NAG) ---' nag_a = 0.0d0 nag_b = 1.0d0 nag_epsabs = 1.0d-10 nag_epsrel = 1.0d-10 nag_limit = 100 nag_ifail = 0
call D01AHF(nag_a, nag_b, func_for_int, nag_epsabs, nag_epsrel, + nag_limit, nag_result, nag_abserr, nag_w, nag_lenw, + nag_iw, nag_leniw, nag_ifail)
write(*,*) 'D01AHF Results:' write(*,*) ' Result:', nag_result write(*,*) ' Absolute error estimate:', nag_abserr write(*,*) ' Exit code (ifail):', nag_ifail write(*,*) ' Actual absolute error:', abs(nag_result - analytical_sol) write(*,*)
write(*,*) '==========================================' write(*,*) 'Test Complete' write(*,*) '=========================================='
end
c ======================================== c Function to be integrated: f(x) = x*x c ======================================== double precision function func_for_int(x) implicit none double precision x func_for_int = x * x return end

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
program dqags_test implicit none
c Test program for DQAGS (Netlib/QUADPACK) c Compatible with Microsoft Fortran PowerStation 4.0
c External function to be integrated external func_for_int
c DQAGS variables double precision a, b, epsabs, epsrel, result, abserr integer limit, neval, ier, last integer lenw parameter (lenw = 400) integer iwork(lenw) double precision work(lenw)
c Common variables double precision analytical_sol
write(*,*) '==========================================' write(*,*) 'DQAGS (Netlib/QUADPACK) Test' write(*,*) '==========================================' write(*,*) write(*,*) 'Integrating f(x) = x*x from 0 to 1' write(*,*) 'Analytical solution = 1/3' analytical_sol = 1.0d0 / 3.0d0 write(*,*) 'Analytical solution:', analytical_sol write(*,*) c c --------------------------------- c Test 1: DQAGS from Netlib/QUADPACK c --------------------------------- write(*,*) '--- Testing DQAGS (Netlib/QUADPACK) ---' a = 0.0d0 b = 1.0d0 epsabs = 1.0d-10 epsrel = 1.0d-10 limit = 100
call DQAGS(func_for_int, a, b, epsabs, epsrel, result, + abserr, neval, ier, limit, lenw, last, iwork, work)
write(*,*) 'DQAGS Results:' write(*,*) ' Result:', result write(*,*) ' Absolute error estimate:', abserr write(*,*) ' Number of evaluations:', neval write(*,*) ' Exit code (ier):', ier write(*,*) ' Actual absolute error:', dabs(result - + analytical_sol) write(*,*) c write(*,*) '==========================================' write(*,*) 'Test Complete' write(*,*) '=========================================='
end
c ======================================== c Function to be integrated: f(x) = x*x c ======================================== double precision function func_for_int(x) implicit none double precision x func_for_int = x * x return end

option.name: originalContent
option.value: C globals.inc - Shared parameters and variables for the plasma code C C --- Parameters --- INTEGER, PARAMETER :: NSTm=300, nvM=3000, LaMx=2, mSpe=6 REAL(8), PARAMETER :: pin=3.1415926535d0, one=1.d0, zero=0.d0 C C --- Plasma State Common Block --- COMMON /STATE/ La, tf, ti, Te, TiD, DenI, Dene, R2, ZC1, ZC2 INTEGER La, ng REAL(8) tf, ti, Te, TiD, DenI(2), Dene, R2, ZC1, ZC2, POPt(NSTm, 2, LaMx) C C --- Atomic and Line Data Common Block --- COMMON /LINES/ hvC(MNLe), nLo(MNLe), nUp(MNLe), nX3(MNLe), linM4 INTEGER nLo, nUp, nX3, linM4 REAL(8) hvC, A(NSTm,NSTm,2), g0(NSTm,2), E(NSTm,2), flu(NSTm,NSTm,2) C C --- Output Arrays Common Block --- COMMON /OUTPUT/ emTot(LaMx,nvM), abTot(LaMx,nvM) REAL(8) emTot, abTot C C (add all other necessary common blocks and variables here)

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: C globals.inc - Shared parameters and variables for the plasma code C C --- Parameters --- INTEGER, PARAMETER :: NSTm=1612, nvM=12300, LaMx=2, mSpe=6 INTEGER, PARAMETER :: MNLe=11566, nXE=2, HSSm=36 REAL(8), PARAMETER :: pin=3.1415926535d0, one=1.d0, zero=0.d0 REAL(8), PARAMETER :: ToPi=2.d0*pin, FoPi=4.d0*pin REAL(8), PARAMETER :: BolJ=1.6021773d-19, h=4.1356692d-15 REAL(8), PARAMETER :: eVA=12398.424d0 C C --- Plasma State Common Block --- COMMON /STATE/ La, tf, ti, Te, TiD, DenI, Dene, R2, ZC1, ZC2, ng INTEGER La, ng REAL(8) tf, ti, Te, TiD, DenI(2), Dene, R2, ZC1, ZC2 C C --- Population and Energy Level Data --- COMMON /LEVELS/ POPt, E, g0, BE, A, flu, Wout REAL(8) POPt(NSTm, nXE, LaMx), E(NSTm,nXE), g0(NSTm,nXE) REAL(8) BE(NSTm), A(NSTm,NSTm,nXE), flu(NSTm,NSTm,nXE) REAL(8) Wout(NSTm,nXE,LaMx) C C --- Atomic and Line Data Common Block --- COMMON /LINES/ hvC, nLo, nUp, nX3, linM4, hvV INTEGER nLo(MNLe), nUp(MNLe), nX3(MNLe), linM4 REAL(8) hvC(MNLe), hvV(nvM) C C --- Ion and Species Data --- COMMON /SPECIES/ Den, Nnu, FSS, HSS, NST, kiSS, nprin INTEGER Nnu(nXE), FSS(nXE), HSS(nXE), NST(nXE) INTEGER kiSS(NSTm,nXE), nprin(NSTm,nXE) REAL(8) Den(nXE) C C --- Spectral Data --- COMMON /SPECTRAL/ FWkVcGAU, AtMass, PI, PIR, DPI, hvSmo, hvMax REAL(8) FWkVcGAU(nXE), AtMass(nXE), PI(HSSm,nXE) REAL(8) PIR(HSSm,nXE), DPI(HSSm,nXE), hvSmo, hvMax C C --- Output Arrays Common Block --- COMMON /OUTPUT/ emTot, abTot, FWevLor, FWvoi REAL(8) emTot(LaMx,nvM), abTot(LaMx,nvM) REAL(8) FWevLor(MNLe), FWvoi(MNLe) C C --- Names and Control --- COMMON /NAMES/ QSname1, QSname2, gpEq, PrFr CHARACTER*5 QSname1(NSTm,nXE), QSname2(NSTm,nXE) INTEGER gpEq(mSpe), PrFr
